school.name: University of California, Berkeley, Haas School of Business

projects.title: MVO Workshops met Verbos Academy
projects.description:
We verzorgen twee trainingen. De eerste op 21 mei a.s. heeft tot doel om het bewustzijn en de kennis over MVO te verbreden voor bedrijven met startende MVO-ambities. Voor gevorderde ondernemers focussen we op 11 juni op verbinding en draagvlak voor MVO bij in- en externe stakeholders. 

In een volledig verzorgd dagprogramma nemen we u in de ochtend mee in één van de best denkbare bronnen van inspiratie: de natuur! Daar zult u onder begeleiding van een heuse schaapherder niet alleen veel informatie krijgen, maar ook zelf concreet aan de slag gaan in teamverband.

Het middagprogramma is opgebouwd uit diverse modules waarbij kennis op een leerzame, soms ludieke, maar ook interactieve wijze overgebracht wordt. Ook werken we met aansprekende voorbeelden en is er alle ruimte voor eigen inbreng.

contributors.headline: "Nature always wears the colours of the spirit"

projects.title: Worskhop "MVO - wat voor ons?"
projects.description:
Steeds vaker horen we bedrijven, organisaties dat ze wat met MVO willen maar niet weten hoe. Tijdens de workshop "MVO-wat voor ons? " krijgt u op een interactieve, onconventionele en praktische manier inzicht in -  en handvatten voor uw MVO strategie.  
Donderdag 21 mei a.s. staat er een workshop gepland ... reageer snel, want VOL is VOL.

projects.title: Aqua Soil Approach
projects.description: Development of a Metropolitan Food Cluster via the Aqua-Soil Approach. Organic waste and waste water from our cities are used for the development of food production. Via this methodology we address social and environmental challenges concerning water management, food security, poverty and more.

projects.title: Stevia®
projects.description:
Stevia is a South American herb used as a natural sweetener for centuries. The leaves of the Stevia rebaudiana plant have a refreshing taste, zero glycemic index, zero calories and zero carbs. It is 25-30 times sweeter than sugar, and far more healthy!  
Visit our website for more information : www.stevia.nl

profile_positions.title: Co-Founder / Co-owner

profile_positions.description:
Covestment Cooperation in Good Business.

Wij zijn ervan overtuigd dat de toekomst aan bedrijven is die met hun producten en diensten bijdragen aan een betere wereld. Het is de hoogste tijd dat er meer van deze Good Business bedrijven komen en dat ze nog sneller groeien. Dat vraagt om anders denken en andere oplossingen. Dat vraagt om een organisatie met een nieuwe structuur waarin ondernemers, investeerders en consultants hun krachten bundelen. Een organisatie die geld en expertise op een andere manier investeert. Wij bouwen die organisatie. Generous Minds. The Covestment Cooperation in Good Business. 

 >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>><<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<

 We are convinced that the future is in the hands of companies who create a better world with their products and services. There is an urgency for these Good Business companies and for them to grow and develop. This means thinking differently and considering alternative solutions. It means creating new organizational structures where entrepreneurs, investors and consultants join forces. An organization that invests money and expertise in a different way. We build this organization. Generous Minds. The Covestment Cooperation in Good Business.
profile_positions.title: Covestor in Good Business / Co-owner

profile_positions.description: FairMatch Support develops sustainable supply chains. From our offices in The Netherlands and West Africa we support companies in finding new sources and producers in finding new markets. We are most emphatically present where the chain link is weakest. Our underlying philosophy is: high quality standards, realistic profit distribution and long-term collaboration. Our worldwide network of local partner organisations is an integral part of our organisation.

profile_positions.description: Sweet World Stevia aims to bring health to the people.  Hippocrates said: "Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food’.  At the same time we want to pay farmers a better price to keep us healthy instead of pay doctors to make us better  !!     Currently we grow in Kenya, Uganda and South Africa. We are open for more farmers who are interested in growing this beautiful product.

volunteer_experiences.description:
SportsLink is a knowledge driven sports community.
The app connects different groups in sport, empowering them to achieve the ultimate in their sport.
We empower co-creations between athletes, sports experts, companies and fans to enable them to get the most out of their passion for sports.  
I am officially a verified expert. I share my knowledge and experience regarding sustainability with the sportsworld by means of unique content (blogs, photo's, video's, posts, etc.   Curious?  Check out the my SportsLink profile: https://sports.link/profile/aart-van-den-bos-fpiycr2jy6 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
SportsLink is een kennisgedreven platform waar sporters, sportliefhebbers, bonden, verenigingen, coaches en experts samenkomen om met elkaar in verbinding te komen en kennis te delen, zodat zij het maximale uit hun passie voor de sport kunnen halen.     Ik ben officieel een geverifieerd expert op dit platform. Ik deel mijn kennis en ervaring over mijn vakgebied met de sportwereld in de vorm van unieke content (blogs, foto’s, video’s, posts, etc.).  Benieuwd?  check snel mijn SportsLink-profiel: https://sports.link/profile/aart-van-den-bos-fpiycr2jy6
Streekverband de Tien is a small NGO representing 16 churches supporting 6 different projects in developing countries. Feel free to visit the (Dutch) site at: www.streekverband-de-tien.nl !

Recognizing SDG framework both as the opportunity and the risk in the way we look at the development, a partnership by Businesses, Authorities and Civil Societies, need to be forged. It is equally critical to launch programs that prepare our next generation to protect and conserve natural resources.

For a single entity, the task of working on all 17 Goals and 169 targets under SDG is insurmountable keeping this in mind SDG foundation has decided to focus on 4 goals to ensure better understanding and implementation.
(9) Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
(12) Responsible consumption and Production
(13) Climate Action
(17) Partnerships for the Goals

The Sustainable Pineapple Alliance (SPA) is established to motivate, stimulate, help and assist stakeholders in the global pineapple supply chain to move towards sustainable pineapples for everybody.  A group of international experts from the pineapple chain joined forces to establish SPA with the intention to be instrumental in this process.  See also: www.sustainable-pineapple-alliance.org

Goals of the Soil & More Foundation:
•To develop and realize research and development projects related to soil in general but specifically regarding soil fertility, soil carbon, compost and compost extract, water holding capacity, natural disease suppression, soil and soil carbon based incentive schemes and the economics of sustainable soil and compost management based agriculture.
•To further develop the concept of the Sustainability Flower in regards to the assessment criteria and guidelines, tools and methodologies, communication frameworks as well as legalities such as membership structures and general administration. 
•To establish a research and development network with public and private sector entities. 
•To organize educational and awareness raising events for sustainable development in the agricultural sector

The Soil & More Foundation holds the official ANBI status awarded by the Dutch tax authorities. This refers to charitable, religious, humanistic, cultural and scientific institutions whose mission and operations are deemed by the Tax Service overwhelmingly to serve the Common Good
In a team of 4 advising the executive board of the most creative sportsclub of the Netherlands (award winning 2014).
